item.title: Node Red and Home Assistant
item.description: How to migrate a VM between GCP projects This post assumes that you already have node-red running and it’s able to talk to home-assistant. Click the Menu in the top left corner then select Manage Palette Click on Install then in the searchbox, seach for home-assistant and install both node-red-contrib-home-assistant-websocket and node-red-contrib-hass Configure the connection to your Home-Assistant server.
